lexUnit.name: flock.n
lexUnit.definition: COD: a number of birds moving or resting together

sentence.text: Unleashed by the deregulation of 1986 , building societies have spread their tentacles across the country and attracted a flock of satellite industries , especially in legal services , accountancy and financial consulting .
